welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zossen, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of our small town known for its beautiful parks and historical landmarks. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that Zossen has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device, can be extended for a fee.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin-Schoenefeld Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin-Schoenefeld Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Handles mainly low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Handles mainly international flights for smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
